ygData.subject: Re: Alright I am sufficiently ticked now
ygData.msgSnippet: I made my first Trueshot last night. I scraped together enough materials to make 10. Was I shocked when I did it on the first try with a fletching of 148. I
ygData.messageBody:
I made my first Trueshot last night. I scraped
together enough materials to make 10. Was I shocked when I
did it on the first try with a fletching of 148. I
sold that one to a guildmate of mine and made another
one on my next try. Hardest part of making this
sucker is getting the microservos from the clockworks in
Steamfont. I ran around there for 2 hours and only 4
dropped. Just enough to make 2. Great bow by the way.
First shot with it I criticalled for
56.<br><br>Linolwen Spiritchaser <Keeper of Eternal
Shadows><br>32nd season Ranger<br>Fenin Ro<br>Master Fletcher
(150)
